title: Lux Straight & Beauty Massugu Ikiru

synonyms: Miku ga Toujou Shita CM: Lux Straight & Beauty Tanjou-hen
alternative_titles.ja: ラックス ストレート＆ビューティー まっすぐ生きる

synopsis:
A commercial for Lux shampoo and conditioner featuring virtual idol Hatsune Miku and Ghost in the Shell star Scarlett Johansson. 

Miku is on a city street with European architecture when she looks up and sees a LUX shampoo and conditioner advertisement starring Johansson. After she lets down her hair, she performs at a concert venue full of fans excited to see her new look.

(Source: Arama! Japan)
